about_the_game: Cubeland, the white square with a sharp aim and sharper instincts. Making his grand debut as a DLC fighter in the dynamic world of Battlemon, Cubeland is ready to bring his unique blend of tactical brilliance and deadly accuracy to your battles. Cubeland aim is unparalleled in Battlemon. With a flick of his corner, he can hit targets at impossible distances with pinpoint accuracy. His gun, the Pistol, fires perfectly squared bullets that can ricochet off surfaces, making him a master of trick shots and surprise angles. His solid, symmetrical form provides unmatched stability, allowing him to stay grounded and composed under pressure.

name: Battlemon - Cubeland Character

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Additional Notes: If you can run other 2D games on steam you should be OK
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

short_description: Gain access to Cubeland Character In Battlemon
